tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_nutrient_levels (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  sample_date DATE,
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_recommendations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_type VARCHAR,
  nitrogen_amount FLOAT,
  phosphorus_amount FLOAT,
  potassium_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  nutrient_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE fertilizers (
  fertilizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  npk_ratio VARCHAR(20),
  application_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_applications (
  application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  fertilizer_id INT,
  application_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FertilizerApplications (
  application_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT REFERENCES FarmFields(field_id),
  fertilizer_id INT REFERENCES FertilizerTypes(fertilizer_id),
  applied_amount NUMERIC,
  application_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSample (
    Sample_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Field_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Nutrient_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Sample_Date DATE NOT NULL,
    Nutrient_Level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (Field_ID) REFERENCES Field(Field_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Nutrient_ID) REFERENCES Nutrient(Nutrient_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE Fertilizer (
    Fertilizer_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Fertilizer_Name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    Nutrient_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Chemical_Composition VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (Nutrient_ID) REFERENCES Nutrient(Nutrient_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE ApplicationRecord (
    Record_ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Field_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Fertilizer_ID INT NOT NULL,
    Application_Date DATE NOT NULL,
    Quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (Field_ID) REFERENCES Field(Field_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Fertilizer_ID) REFERENCES Fertilizer(Fertilizer_ID)
);
